languages.text: "Меня зовут Фроше, Ваша Светлость. Я имею честь быть ординарцем Лорд-инквизитора". {n}Мужчина не вооружен и не носит знаков Инквизиции, но стержень, упрятанный в его армейскую осанку, заставляет предположить в нем не только слугу, но и телохранителя.{/n}

"My name is Froscher, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I have the honour of being the Lord Inquisitor's retainer." {n}The man is unarmed and wearing no Inquisition insignia, but the military sharpness of his upright posture suggests he is a servant who doubles as a bodyguard.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Меня зовут Фроше, Ваша Светлость. Я имею честь быть ординарцем Лорд-инквизитора". {n}Мужчина не вооружен и не носит знаков Инквизиции, но стержень, упрятанный в его армейскую осанку, заставляет предположить в нем не только слугу, но и телохранителя.{/n}

traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

traits.locale_text: "My name is Froscher, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I have the honour of being the Lord Inquisitor's retainer." {n}The man is unarmed and wearing no Inquisition insignia, but the military sharpness of his upright posture suggests he is a servant who doubles as a bodyguard.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: “我叫弗罗舍，大人。我有幸侍奉大审判官大人。”{n}这个人并没有携带武器，也没有佩戴审判庭的徽章，但他挺拔的军姿表明他不仅仅是大审判官的仆人，也同样是他的私人护卫。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My name is Froscher, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I have the honour of being the Lord Inquisitor's retainer." {n}The man is unarmed and wearing no Inquisition insignia, but the military sharpness of his upright posture suggests he is a servant who doubles as a bodyguard.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我叫弗罗舍，大人。我有幸侍奉审判长大人。”{n}这个人并没有携带武器，也没有佩戴审判庭的徽章，但他挺拔的军姿表明他不仅仅是审判长的仆人，也同样是他的私人护卫。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: 「私はフロッシャーと申します、陛下。おそれ多くも、私はロード・インクィジターの従者を務めさせていただいております」{n}男は丸腰で、異端審問庁の記章さえも身に付けていなかった。だが、彼の軍人のような鋭い姿勢からは、この男が召使でありながら、同時にボディーガードでもあることが伝わってきた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My name is Froscher, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I have the honour of being the Lord Inquisitor's retainer." {n}The man is unarmed and wearing no Inquisition insignia, but the military sharpness of his upright posture suggests he is a servant who doubles as a bodyguard.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私はフロッシャーと申します、陛下。おそれ多くも、私はロード・インクィジターの従者を務めさせていただいております」{n}男は丸腰で、異端審問庁の記章さえも身に付けていなかった。だが、彼の軍人のような鋭い姿勢からは、この男が召使でありながら、同時にボディーガードでもあることが伝わってきた。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: «Me llamo Froscher, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Tengo el honor de estar a las órdenes del Lord Inquisidor». {n}El hombre no está armado ni lleva ninguna insignia de la Inquisición, pero la agudeza militar de su postura erguida sugiere que es un sirviente que hace las veces de guardaespaldas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My name is Froscher, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I have the honour of being the Lord Inquisitor's retainer." {n}The man is unarmed and wearing no Inquisition insignia, but the military sharpness of his upright posture suggests he is a servant who doubles as a bodyguard.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Me llamo Froscher, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Tengo el honor de ser el oficial del Lord Inquisidor». {n}El hombre no está armado ni lleva ninguna insignia de la Inquisición, pero la agudeza militar de su postura erguida sugiere que es un sirviente que hace las veces de guardaespaldas.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: "Ich heiße Froscher, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Ich habe die Ehre, das Faktotum des Großinquisitors sein zu dürfen." {n}Der Mann ist unbewaffnet und trägt keine Insignien der Inquisition, doch die militärische Schärfe seiner aufrechten Haltung lässt vermuten, dass er nicht nur Diener, sondern auch Leibwächter ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My name is Froscher, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I have the honour of being the Lord Inquisitor's retainer." {n}The man is unarmed and wearing no Inquisition insignia, but the military sharpness of his upright posture suggests he is a servant who doubles as a bodyguard.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich heiße Froscher, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Ich habe die Ehre, der Diener des Großinquisitors sein zu dürfen." {n}Der Mann ist unbewaffnet und trägt keine Insignien der Inquisition, doch die militärische Schärfe seiner aufrechten Haltung lässt vermuten, dass er nicht nur Diener, sondern auch Leibwächter ist.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: « Je me nomme Froscher, Votre Seigneurie. J'ai l'honneur d'être le serviteur du seigneur inquisiteur. » {n}L'homme ne porte ni arme ni insigne de l'Inquisition, mais son maintien quasi militaire laisse à penser qu'il est bien plus qu'un simple serviteur ; vous ne seriez pas {mf|étonné|étonnée} qu'il serve aussi de garde du corps.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My name is Froscher, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I have the honour of being the Lord Inquisitor's retainer." {n}The man is unarmed and wearing no Inquisition insignia, but the military sharpness of his upright posture suggests he is a servant who doubles as a bodyguard.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je me nomme Froscher, Votre Seigneurie. J'ai l'honneur d'être sous les ordres du seigneur inquisiteur. » {n}L'homme ne porte pas d'arme ni d'insigne de l'Inquisition, mais son maintien quasi militaire laisse à penser qu'il est bien plus qu'un simple serviteur ; vous ne seriez pas {mf|étonné|étonnée} qu'il serve aussi de garde du corps.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: "İsmim Froscher'dir {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun uşağı olma onuruna sahibim." {n}Adam silahsız ve Engizisyon arması taşımıyor ancak dik duruşundaki askerî edadan korumalık da yapan bir hizmetkâr olduğunu anlayabiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My name is Froscher, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I have the honour of being the Lord Inquisitor's retainer." {n}The man is unarmed and wearing no Inquisition insignia, but the military sharpness of his upright posture suggests he is a servant who doubles as a bodyguard.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İsmim Froscher {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun uşağı olma onuruna sahibim." {n}Adam silahsız ve Engizisyon arması taşımıyor ancak dik duruşundaki askerî edadan, aynı zamanda korumalık da yapan bir hizmetkâr olduğunu anlayabiliyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche
